Asteroid Class

Class representing asteroids from Gaia.

class asteroid.Asteroid(source_id=0, number_mp=0, denomination='')

An asteroid in Gaia.sso_source database with observations

Parameters

  • source_id (long) – Unique source identifier from gaia_source

  • number_mp (long) – Minor Planet number attributed by MPC

  • denomination (string) – Name of asteroid in MPC database

source_id

Unique source identifier from gaia_source

Type

long

number_mp

Minor Planet number attributed by MPC

Type

long

denomination

Name of asteroid in MPC database

Type

string

num_of_obs

Number of observations for the asteroid that appear in sso_observation

Type

int

observations

Dataframe of observations from sso_observation. Includes source_id, number_mp, epoch, ra, dec.

Type

dataframe

set_sso_source(sso_source_results)

Sets attributes of Asteroid object from results of Gaia query in sso_source

Parameters

sso_source_results (Table) – Table of results from query job for gaia.sso_source. Includes source_id, num_of_obs, number_mp, denomination.

Returns

Table of results from query job including source_id, num_of_obs, number_mp, denomination

Return type

Table
